name: Space Odyssey (itch) (snowycat)
description:
Dear Guest!

This is my first game on a new engine. In order not to feel a sense of incompleteness, I decided to put this thing on public display.

You can fly in space and shoot asteroids. Use bonuses, they will add effects to your ship.

For control.

  • Use w/a/s/d keys to control.
  • Mouse to control the tower.
  • The right key is for the main guns, and the left key is for the main gun.

Fly with pleasure!!

If you would like to leave a comment, please do so. I will answer as soon as possible.

I would like to express my gratitude to the creators of the pictures, whose works I used for this product.

https://zintoki.itch.io/space-breaker

https://opengameart.org/content/asteroids-0

https://opengameart.org/content/ui-pack 
www.kenney.nl

https://opengameart.org/content/another-space-background-track

https://opengameart.org/content/space-music-blind-shift

Thenks !!!
